strapiPost.title: DWTN Now Releases Latest Episode On Local Food Systems
strapiPost.content:
The latest episode of DWTN Now, the television show produced by Downtown Bentonville Incorporated, explores Northwest Arkansas’s local food system. 

  • Farm to Market to Table: Learn how NWA Food Systems supports small and mid-sized farmers in our area, and head to A&A Orchard to find out how they’ve been growing beautiful peaches and nectarines for years!
  • Cooking lesson: Tune in and learn how even you can whip up a delicious gluten-free Chicken Schnitzel with Tomato Peach Salad with Chef Matt Cooper of Conifer! Catch the show on KNWA (NBC-TV) this Saturday at 5p, or watch it online now!

Check out more from DWTN Now HERE.
